field.value: IDictionary parameters passed in via Hashtable and configuration parameters

field.name: description
field.value:
When passing parameters in via a Hashtable, if a parameter is not included in the hashtable it should use the value in the configuration file.
For now, if you pass in a hashtable, it expects all the values passed in. There are instances where I have several parameters but only want to 'override' one parameter.
